result.title: Country report on certified and non-certified education for craftsmen in energy issues
result.description: Report about the available trainings offers for craftsmen regarding energy efficiency and renewable energy for historic buildings. For partner countries (AT, ES, SK, PT and UK) this will be done in detail. For countries with consortium contacts (BE, DE, FR, HU, PL and NO) it will only be a brief overview.
